instructions: Tap the Settings app to open the Android settings. Go to Cloud and accounts and tap Backup and restore . If that option isn't on your device, select System > Backup . The options for each phone are different, so you may need to hunt for this setting. Select the backup options you want. Many phones display the last time the data was backed up, as well as a way to back up manually.

Download Google Photos from the Play Store , then open the app. In the search bar at the top, tap Menu (the three stacked horizontal lines), then select Settings . Select Back up & Sync . Turn on the Back up & sync toggle switch. If you want to back up photos from locations other than your camera folder, select Back up device folders and choose the folders to back up.
